example:
() => (
  <Stack direction="column">
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Small
      </Heading>
      <ServiceLogo size="small" name="Booking" />
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Medium
      </Heading>
      <ServiceLogo name="Booking" />
    </Stack>
    <Stack direction="column">
      <Heading type="title3" as="h3">
        Large
      </Heading>
      <ServiceLogo size="large" name="Booking" />
    </Stack>
  </Stack>
)

info.title: Sizes
info.description: Logos can be small, medium (the default), or large.
